channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics

item.title: Zelenskyy says peace deal is close after Trump meeting but territory remains sticking point
item.description: Ukraine's Zelenskyy says peace talks with Russia are 'very close' but territorial disputes remain the key sticking point after recent Trump meeting.
